quotes.quote: I do not fear computers. I fear lack of them.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: A computer once beat me at chess, but it was no match for me at kick boxing.
quotes.author: Emo Philips

quotes.quote: Physics is the universe's operating system.
quotes.author: Steven R Garman

quotes.quote: The computer was born to solve problems that did not exist before.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Software is like sex. It's better when it's free.
quotes.author: Linus Torvalds

quotes.quote: UNIX is simple. It just takes a genius to understand its simplicity.
quotes.author: Dennis Ritchie

quotes.quote: Potential partners are like internet domain names — the ones I like are already taken.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: vi vi vi — the editor of the beast.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Good code is its own best documentation
quotes.author: Steve McConnell
